	<TD class="tr3 td228"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Article 3a</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr0"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p3">Interaction avec dautres</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr0 td228"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p3">Interaction with other</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">accords internationaux</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr25 td228"><P style="font: italic 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 12px;" class="p3">international agreements</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 2px 0px 0px 32px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 111px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: italic 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p24">Artikel 3a Interaktion med andra internationella instrument</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 15px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 595px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 275px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"> 1 Les vhicules ferroviaires et dautres matriels ferro- viaires mis en service con- formment  la lgislation de la Communaut europenne (CE) applicable et  la lgislation nationale corre- spondante, sont considrs comme admis  lexploitation par tous les Etats parties</P>
<P class="p2000 ft0">1014</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 122px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 7px;line-height: 13px;">1 Railway vehicles and other railway material which have been placed in service according to applicable Euro- pean Community (EC) and corresponding national legis- lation shall be deemed as ad- mitted to operation by all Contracting States according to these Uniform Rules</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 12px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 186px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">1 Jrnvgsfordon och annan jrnvgsmateriel som har satts i anvndning av tillmplig</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1445 ft205">lagstiftning frn den</P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p24">Europeiska gemenskapen</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">(EG) och motsvarande nationell lagstiftning ska anses godknda fr anvnd- ning av alla deltagande stater i enlighet med dessa enhetliga rttsregler</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_361" style="position:relative; overflow: hidden;margin: 54px 0px 79px 75px;padding: 0px;border: none;width: 549px;">


<DIV style="border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 549px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 122px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p24">conformment aux prsentes Rgles uniformes</P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1452"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">e)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">en cas dquivalence pleine et entire entre les dispositions des STI applicables et les PTU correspondantes, et</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 13px;"> condition que la panoplie des STI ap- plicables, en vertu desquelles le vhicule ferroviaire ou dautres matriels ferroviaires ont t autoriss, cou- vrent lensemble des aspects des </SPAN><NOBR>sous-sys-</NOBR> tmes concerns qui font partie du vhicule et</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 4px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">g)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;"> condition que ces STI ne contiennent aucun point ouvert relatif  la compatibi- lit technique avec linfrastructure et</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">h)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;"> condition que le vhicule ou dautres matriels ferroviaires ne</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">fassent pas lobjet dune drogation.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Si ces conditions ne sont pas remplies, le vhicule ou lautre matriel ferroviaire est rgi par larticle 6,  4.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 17px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">2 Les vhicules ferroviaires et dautres matriels ferro- viaires ayant t admis  lexploitation conformment aux prsentes Rgles uni- formes, sont considrs com- me mis en service dans les Etats membres de la Com- munaut europenne et dans les Etats appliquant la lgis- lation communautaire par suite daccords internationaux conclus avec la Communaut europenne</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 25px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 134px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">e)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">in the case of full equivalence between the provisions in the applicable TSIs and</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">the corresponding UTP and</P>
<P class="p1694 ft205"><SPAN class="ft204">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 14px;">provided the set of</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">applicable TSIs, against which the railway vehicle or other railway material was authorised, cover all aspects of the rele- vant subsystems that are part of the vehicle and</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 42px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">g)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 14px;">provided these TSIs do not contain open points related to the technical compatibil- ity with infrastructure and</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">h)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">provided the vehicle or other railway mate- rial is not subject to a derogation.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 14px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">If these conditions are not fulfilled, the vehicle or other railway material shall be subject to Article 6  4.</P>
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2108"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">2 Railway vehicles and other railway material which have been admitted to opera- tion according to these Uni- form Rules shall be deemed as placed in service in the Member States of the Euro- pean Community and in the States which apply Com- munity legislation as a result of international agreements with the European Communi- ty in the case of</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 280px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p2214 ft0">Prop. 2021/22:83</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 155px;margin-top: 12px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">e)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">vid full verens- stmmelse mellan be- stmmelserna i den tillmpliga TSD:n och</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 160px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">den motsvarande UTP:n och</P>
<P class="p1694 ft205"><SPAN class="ft204">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 14px;">under frutsttning att</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 154px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">de tillmpliga TSD:erna, i enlighet med vilken eller vilka jrnvgsfordonet eller den andra jrnvgsma-</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 155px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">terielen godkndes, omfattar alla aspekter av det aktuella delsy- stemet som r en del av fordonet och</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 155px;margin-top: 15px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">g)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">under frutsttning att dessa TSD:er inte in- nehller ppna punk- ter som hnfr sig till den tekniska kompa- tibiliteten med infra- strukturen och</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 154px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">h)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">under frutsttning att fordonet eller den andra jrnvgsmaterielen inte</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 160px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">r freml fr ett un- dantag.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 160px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Om dessa villkor inte r uppfyllda ska artikel 6  4 tillmpas p fordonet eller den andra jrnvgsmateri- elen.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 154px;margin-top: 5px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft204"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft203">2 Jrnvgsfordon och annan jrnvgsmateriel som har</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 154px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">godknts enligt dessa enhetliga rttsregler ska anses som godknda fr ibruk- tagande i Europeiska gemen- skapens medlemsstater samt de stater som tillmpar gemenskapsrtt som en fljd av ett internationellt avtal med Europeiska gemenskapen</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 3px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 498px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 1px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 120px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1480"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">e)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">en cas dquivalence pleine et entire entre les dispositions des PTU applicables et les STI correspondantes et</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 378px;overflow: hidden;">

</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td208"><P class="p3 ft136">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td238"><P class="p3 ft136">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr3 td225"><P class="p28 ft205">PTU</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td121"><P class="p2267 ft204">ne</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr3 td231"><P class="p1147 ft204">contiennent</P></TD>

<TR>
	<TD class="tr0 td208"><P style="font: 1px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr0 td238"><P style="font: 1px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr0 td241"><P class="p28 ft204">aucun point ouvert re-</P></TD>

<TR>
	<TD class="tr0 td208"><P style="font: 1px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr0 td238"><P style="font: 1px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p3">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr0 td225"><P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p28">latif </P></TD>
	<TD class="tr0 td121"><P class="p2237 ft204">la</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr0 td231"><P class="p1147 ft204">compatibilit</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr3 td208"><P class="p3 ft136">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td238"><P class="p3 ft136">&nbsp;</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr25 td208"><P class="p3 ft136">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr25 td238"><P class="p3 ft136">&nbsp;</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr25 td61"><P class="p3 ft136">&nbsp;</P></TD>

</TABLE>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 165px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 13px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -23px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">h)  condition que le vhicule ou dautres matriels ferroviaires ne fassent pas lobjet dune drogation.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Si ces conditions ne sont pas remplies, le vhicule ou le matriel ferroviaire sera soumis  autorisation con- formment au droit appli- cable dans les Etats mem- bres de la Communaut europenne et dans les Etats appliquant la lgislation communautaire par suite</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">daccords internationaux conclus avec la Com- munaut europenne.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"> 3 Ladmission  lexploit- ation, la circulation et la maintenance des vhicules ferroviaires et dautres matriels ferroviaires uti- liss dans les Etats membre de la Communaut europ- enne, sont rgies par les lgislations communautaire et nationale applicables. Cette disposition est gale- ment applicable aux Etats parties appliquant la lgis- lation de la Communaut europenne pertinente par suite daccords internation- aux conclus avec <NOBR>celle-ci.</NOBR></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 19px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft204"> 4 Les  1  2 sappliquent par analogie aux admis-</P>
<P class="p1820 ft0">1016</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 4px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 134px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p24 ft205"><SPAN class="ft204">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 14px;">provided the set of</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">applicable UTP against which the railway vehicle or other railway material was authorised covers all aspects of the rele- vant subsystems that are part of the vehicle and</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 42px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">g)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 14px;">provided these UTP do not contain open points related to the technical compatibil- ity with infrastructure and</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">h)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">provided the vehicle or other railway mate- rial is not subject to a derogation.</SPAN></P>
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2088">If these conditions are not fulfilled, the vehicle or other railway material shall be subject to authorisation according to the law appli- cable in the Member States of the European Community and in the States which apply Community legisla- tion as a result of internat- ional agreements with the European Community.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 12px;margin-top: 17px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">3 The admission to opera- tion, the operation and the maintenance of railway ve- hicles and other railway material being used only in Member States of the European Community are regulated by the applicable Community and national legislation. This provision is also applicable to Contracting States which apply relevant European Community legis- lation as a result of inter- national agreements with the European Community.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 32px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft204"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft203">4  1 to 2 apply mutatis mutandis to admissions/au-</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 4px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1480"><SPAN class="ft204">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">under frutsttning att de tillmpliga UTP:erna i enlighet med vilken eller vilka jrnvgs- fordonet eller den andra jrnvgsmaterielen</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 5px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">godkndes, omfattar alla aspekter av det</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 5px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">aktuella delsystemet som r en del av fordonet och</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 11px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">g)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">under frutsttning att dessa UTP:er inte in- nehller ppna punk- ter som hnfr sig till den tekniska kompa- tibiliteten med infra- strukturen och</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">h)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 14px;line-height: 13px;">under frutsttning att fordonet eller den andra jrnvgsmaterielen inte r freml fr ett un- dantag.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Om dessa villkor inte r uppfyllda ska fordonet eller den andra jrnvgsmateri- elen godknnas i enlighet med gllande lag i Europe- iska gemenskapens med- lemsstater samt de stater som tillmpar gemenskaps- rtt som en fljd av ett inter- nationellt avtal med Euro- peiska gemenskapen.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">3 Godknnandet fr drift, driften och underhllet av jrnvgsfordon och annan jrnvgsmateriel som an- vnds enbart i Europeiska gemenskapen regleras av tillmplig gemenskapsrtt och nationell rtt. Denna bestmmelse tillmpas ock- s p deltagande stater som tillmpar gemenskapsrtt som en fljd av ett inter- nationellt avtal med Euro- peiska gemenskapen.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 58px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">4 </SPAN><NOBR>12</NOBR>  tillmpas ocks p godknnande/auktorisat- ion av fordonstyper.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_363" style="position:relative; overflow: hidden;margin: 53px 0px 79px 75px;padding: 0px;border: none;width: 498px;">


<DIV style="border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 492px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 122px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: left;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">sions/autorisations des types de vhicules.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">5 Une entit charge de la maintenance (ECM) dun wagon de marchandises, certifie conformment  larticle 15,  2, est rpute certifie conformment  la lgislation de la Communaut europenne applicable et  la</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">lgislation nationale correspondante et inverse- ment, en cas dquivalence pleine et entire entre le systme de certification adopt en vertu de larticle</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">14a (5) de la directive 2004/49/CE concernant la scurit des chemins de fer communautaires et les rgles adoptes par la Commission dexperts techniques con- formment  larticle 15,  2.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: left;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">thorisations of vehicle typ- es.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">5 An entity in charge of maintenance (ECM) for a freight wagon, certified according to Article 15  2, shall be deemed as certified according to applicable European Community and</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">corresponding national legislation and vice versa in the case of full equivalence between the certification system adopted under Article 14a (5) of the EC Railway Safety Directive 2004/49/EC and rules adopted by the Committee of Technical Experts according to Article 15  2.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 1px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 236px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: right;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft0">Prop. 2021/22:83</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 13px;padding-right: 97px;margin-top: 12px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">5 En underhllsansvarig enhet (ECM) fr en godsvagn som certifierats i enlighet med artikel 15  2 ska anses som certifierad i enlighet med tillmplig gemenskapsrtt och nationell rtt och vice versa vid full verensstmmelse mellan certifieringssystemen som antagits genom artikel 14a(5) i Europeiska Jrnvgs- skerhetsdirektivet 2004/49/EG och de regler som antagits av tekniska expertutskottet enligt artikel 15  2.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 12px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 318px;overflow: hidden;">
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 style="width: 318px;font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';">
<TR>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 135px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Article 4</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Article 4</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr25 td72"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Artikel 4</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 135px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr3"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Procdure</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr3"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Procedure</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td72"><P style="font: italic 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 12px;" class="p3">Frfarande</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 13px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 395px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 135px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: left;padding-right: 15px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 14px;">1 Ladmission technique dun vhicule seffectue:</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">soit, en une seule tape, en octroyant ladmission  lexploi- tation  un vhicule individuel donn,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft204"><SPAN class="ft204">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 12px;">soit, en deux tapes successives, en octro-</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">yant</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">1.</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">ladmission de type de construction  un type de construction donn,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 14px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">2.</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">puis ladmission  lexploitation aux v- hicules individuels r- pondant  ce type de construction par une procdure simplifie de confirmation de lappartenance  ce type.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p1583 ft204"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft203">1 Technical admission of a vehicle shall be carried out</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">either in a single stage by the granting of ad- mission to operation to a given individual vehicle,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 5px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft204"><SPAN class="ft204">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 12px;">or, in two successive stages, by the granting</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 14px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">1.</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">of admission of a type of construction to a given type of con- struction,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft204"><SPAN class="ft204">2.</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 12px;">subsequently an ad- mission to operation to</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">individual vehicles corresponding to this type of construction by a simplified proce- dure verifying that they are of this type.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: left;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft225">1 Tekniskt godknnande av ett fordon ska ske</SPAN></P>
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1480"><SPAN class="ft204">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">antingen i ett enda steg, genom att bevilja ett visst enskilt fordon godknnande fr drift,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 6px;margin-top: 14px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 14px;">eller i tv successiva steg, genom att</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 6px;margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">1.</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">bevilja en viss kon- struktionstyp godkn- nande av konstrukt- ionstyp,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">2.</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">och drefter bevilja enskilda fordon som motsvarar denna kon- struktionstyp godkn- nande fr drift genom ett frenklat frfar- ande som bekrftar att de tillhr denna typ.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 16px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 498px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">2 Les valuations de la conformit dun vhicule ou dun lment de cons- truction aux dispositions des</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">PTU, sur lesquelles ladmission est fonde, peuvent tre scindes en</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 14px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">2 The assessments of the conformity of a vehicle or an element of construction with the provisions of the UTP on which the admis- sion is based may be divided into assessment elements</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 242px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 13px;padding-right: 103px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"> 2 Bedmningarna av ett fordons eller en bestndsdels</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 13px;padding-right: 103px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft204">verensstmmelse med bestmmelserna i den UTP p vilken godknnandet grundar sig kan delas upp i bedm- ningsmoment som vart och ett</P>
<P style="text-align: right;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft0">1017</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_364" style="position:relative; overflow: hidden;margin: 53px 0px 79px 29px;padding: 0px;border: none;width: 595px;">


<DIV style="border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 515px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p24 ft0">Prop. 2021/22:83</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 1px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">modules dvaluation, cha- cun attest par une dclara- tion. Les modules dvalu- ation et le modle de la dclaration sont dfinis par la Commission dexperts techniques.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">3 Les procdures dadmis- sion technique de linfra- structure ferroviaire sont rgies par les dispositions en vigueur dans lEtat partie en question.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 1px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">each evidenced by a declaration. The assessment elements and the format of the declaration shall be defined by the Committee of Technical Experts.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">3 The procedures for the technical admission of railway infrastructure are subject to the provisions in force in the Contracting State in question.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 1px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p1583 ft205">attesteras av en frklaring. Bedmningsmomenten och frklaringens utformning ska bestmmas av tekniska expertutskottet.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 5px;margin-top: 23px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">3 Gllande bestmmelser i den aktuella deltagande staten ska tillmpas p fr- farandet fr tekniskt god- knnande av jrnvgsinfra- struktur.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 14px 0px 0px 141px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 350px;overflow: hidden;">
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 style="width: 350px;font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';">
<TR>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Article 5</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Article 5</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr25 td39"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Artikel 5</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Autorit comptente</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Competent authority</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr25 td39"><P style="font: italic 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 12px;" class="p3">Behrig myndighet</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 13px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 595px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 538px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 141px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p24 ft0">1018</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 134px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2036"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 Ladmission technique relve de lautorit natio- nale ou internationale com- ptente en la matire con- formment aux lois et pre- scriptions en vigueur dans chaque Etat partie.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1609 ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft225">2 Les autorits prvues au</SPAN></P>
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2036"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 6px;line-height: 13px;">1 peuvent transfrer ou transfrent, conformment aux dispositions en vigueur dans leur Etat, en tout ou partie  des organismes reconnus aptes ayant leur sige dans leur Etat, la comptence deffectuer des</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">valuations, y compris dtablir les dclarations correspondantes.</P>
<P class="p1694 ft205">Le transfert de comptence</P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p24"></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -23px;" class="ft204">f) une entreprise de transport ferroviaire,</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">g)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 14px;">un gestionnaire din- frastructure,</SPAN></P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p24"><SPAN class="ft204">h)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">un dtenteur,</SPAN></P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p24"><SPAN class="ft204">i)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 18px;line-height: 13px;">une entit charge de</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">la maintenance (ECM),</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">j)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 18px;line-height: 13px;">un concepteur ou cons- tructeur de matriel fer- roviaire participant di- rectement ou indirec- tement  la construction de matriels ferro- viaires,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">y compris les filiales des prcdentes entits, est prohib.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 134px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2036"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 The technical admission shall be the task of the national or international authority competent in the matter in accordance with the laws and prescriptions in force in each Contracting State.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 12px;margin-top: 29px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">2 The authorities referred to in  1 may or, according to the provisions in force in their State, shall transfer to bodies with residence in their State</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 12px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">recognised as suitable, competence to carry out assessments as a whole or partly, including the issuing of the corresponding declara- tions.</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 14px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">The transfer of competence to</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 13px;">a rail transport under- taking,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">g)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 14px;">an infrastructure manager,</SPAN></P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p24"><SPAN class="ft204">h)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">a keeper,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft204"><SPAN class="ft204">i)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 12px;">an entity in charge of maintenance (ECM),</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 11px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">j)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 13px;">a designer or manufacturer of rail- way material partici- pating directly or in- directly in the manu- facture of railway material,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 7px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">including subsidiaries of the foregoing entities shall be prohibited.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 186px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">1 Det tekniska godknn- andet ska ligga den nation- ella eller internationella myndighet som r behrig p omrdet enligt gllande lagar och bestmmelser i varje deltagande stat.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 29px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">2 De myndigheter som avses i  1 fr eller, beroende p tillmpliga bestmmelser i staten, ska verlta befogen- heten att helt eller delvis genomfra frfarandet fr bedmning av verensstm- melse, inklusive utfrdandet av motsvarande frklaringar, p erknda organ som anses lmpliga.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-right: 65px;margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">verltelse av befogenhet till</P>
<P class="p1694 ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 14px;">ett jrnvgsfretag,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 65px;margin-top: 12px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">g)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 14px;line-height: 14px;">en infrastruktur- frvaltare,</SPAN></P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p24"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">h)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 14px;line-height: 13px;">en innehavare,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 61px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">i)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 14px;">en underhllsansvarig enhet (ECM),</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 65px;margin-top: 11px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">j)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 13px;">en konstruktr eller tillverkare av jrn- vgsmateriel som di- rekt eller indirekt deltar i tillverkning av jrnvgsmateriel,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 65px;margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">Inklusive dotterbolag till nmnda enheter ska vara frbjudet.</P>
</DIV>

<TR>
	<TD class="tr0 td26"><P class="p3 ft136">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=6 class="tr0 td259"><P class="p3 ft204">change dinformations</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>

	<TD colspan=6 class="tr0 td259"><P class="p3 ft204">techniques entre le fa-</P></TD>

	<TD colspan=6 class="tr3 td259"><P class="p3 ft204">bricant ou constructeur</P></TD>

<TR>
	<TD class="tr0 td26"><P class="p3 ft136">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=5 class="tr0 td18"><P class="p3 ft204">et ledit organisme.</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr0 td238"><P class="p3 ft136">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 1px 0px 0px 14px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">3 In order to be recognised as suitable the bodies mentioned in  2 must fulfil the following conditions:</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 18px;line-height: 13px;">The body must be inde- pendent in its organisa- tion, legal structure and decision making from any railway undertak- ing, infrastructure man- ager, applicant and pro- curement entity; its Di- rector and the staff re- sponsible for carrying out the assessments or issuing certificates and declarations may not become involved, either directly or as authorised representatives, in the design, manufacture,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 6px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">construction or maintenance of the constituents, vehicles or railway material or in the use thereof. This does not exclude the possibility of an ex- change of technical in- formation between the manufacturer or con- structor and that body.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 280px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 160px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">3 Fr att ett organ som anges i  2 ska erknnas mste fljande villkor vara uppfyllda:</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 155px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">i)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 18px;line-height: 13px;">Organet mste vara oberoende frn varje jrnvgsfretag, infra- strukturfrvaltare, skande och upphand- lingsenhet i sin organi- sation, legala struktur</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 154px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">och beslutsordning; dess direktr och per- sonal ansvarig fr att ut- fra bedmningar eller utfrda intyg, fr inte bli direkt eller ssom auktoriserade represent- anter involverade i</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">design, tillverkning,</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 154px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">konstruktion eller underhll av kompo- nenter, fordon eller jrnvgsmateriel eller i anvndningen av dessa. Detta utesluter inte mjligheten till ett ut- byte av teknisk infor- mation mellan tillverk- are eller konstruktr och det organet.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 2px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 186px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 61px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">soner som pverkas av bedmningsresultatet.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 28px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">k)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 14px;line-height: 13px;">Organet och personalen som r ansvarig fr be- dmningarna ska i syn- nerhet vara funktionellt oberoende av de organ som ansvarar fr utred- ningarna vid olyckor.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 29px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">l)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 13px;">Organet ska anstlla den personal och ha de medel som krvs fr att p ett adekvat stt utfra</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">de tekniska och administrativa uppgifter som r frenade med bedmningarna; det ska ocks ha tillgng till den utrustning som krvs fr srskilda bedm- ningar.</P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1632"><SPAN class="ft204">m)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 12px;line-height: 13px;">Personalen ansvarig</SPAN></P>
<P class="p2022 ft205">fr bedmningarna</P>
<P class="p1446 ft218">ska ha</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 65px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Arial';line-height: 13px;">-</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 20px;line-height: 13px;">lmplig teknisk och yrkesmssig utbild- ning,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Arial';line-height: 13px;">-</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 20px;line-height: 13px;">tillfredsstllande kunskap om de krav som hnfr sig till be- dmningarna som de utfr och tillrcklig praktisk vning i hur man utfr dessa be- dmningar och</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 4px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Arial';line-height: 13px;">-</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 20px;line-height: 13px;">frmga att utarbeta de intyg, frteckningar och rapporter som utgr det formella dokumentet</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 65px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">fr den utfrda bedmningen.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">i)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 13px;">Den personal som r ansvarig fr bedm- ningarna ska garanteras</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">oberoende. Ingen tjnsteman fr ersttas p grundval av antalet utfrda bedmningar eller fr resultatet av dessa bedmningar.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 15px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">j)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 14px;">Organet ska skaffa en ansvarsfrskring, om inte ansvaret tcks av</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_367" style="position:relative; overflow: hidden;margin: 51px 0px 79px 75px;padding: 0px;border: none;width: 549px;">


<DIV style="border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 549px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 3px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1467">moins que ladite res- ponsabilit ne soit couverte par lEtat en vertu de la lgislation nationale ou  moins que les valuations ne soient effectues di- rectement par lEtat partie.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">p)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">Le personnel de lor- ganisme est li par le secret professionnel concernant tout ce qui vient  sa connais- sance dans lexercice de ses fonctions ( lexception des auto- rits administratives</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 4px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">comptentes dans lEtat dans lequel elles exercent ces activits)</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">conformment aux prsentes Rgles uni- formes ou toute exi- gence lgale et/ou</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">rglementations de lEtat partie, y com- pris, au besoin, la l- gislation de la Com- munaut europenne.</P>

	<TD class="tr0 td251"><P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p740">the</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=5 style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 60px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr0"><P style="text-align: center;padding-right: 8px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;white-space: nowrap;" class="ft204">assessments</P></TD>
