<P class="p2022 ft205">munity.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 15px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 498px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 122px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p1742 ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 14px;">4 Les dispositions du  3 sappliquent par analogie aux autorits effectuant ladmission technique.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 13px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 9px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 9px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">5 Un Etat partie veille, par notification ou, au besoin, par les moyens prvus dans le droit communautaire ou dans le droit des Etats appliquant le droit communautaire par suite</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">daccords internationaux conclus avec la Communaut europenne,  ce que le</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Secrtaire gnral soit inform des organismes res- ponsables de la ralisation des valuations, vrifications et homologations, en indiquant le domaine de responsabilit de chacun deux. Le</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Secrtaire gnral publie et tient  jour une liste des organismes, de leur numro didentification et de leurs domaines de responsabilit.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">4 The requirements of  3 shall apply mutatis mutan- dis to the authorities carry- ing out technical admission.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 17px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">5 A Contracting State shall ensure, by notification or where appropriate by the means provided for in the law of the European Community or in the law of the States which apply Community legislation as a result of international agreements with the European Community, that the Secretary General is informed of the bodies responsible for carrying out the assessments, verifications and approvals, indicating each body's area of responsibility. The Secretary General shall publish a list of bodies, their identification numbers and areas of responsibility, and shall keep the list updated.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 242px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 13px;padding-right: 109px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft225">4 Reglerna i  3 ska tillmpas ocks p de myndigheter som utfrdar tekniskt godknnande.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 13px;padding-right: 103px;margin-top: 13px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">5 En deltagande stat ska se till att generalsekreteraren informeras om de organ som r ansvariga fr bedm- ningarna, kontrollerna och</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 13px;padding-right: 103px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">godknnandena, antingen genom notifiering eller, om det r tillmpligt, p det stt gemenskapsrtten eller lagen i de stater som tillmpar gemenskapsrtt som en fljd av ett internationellt avtal med</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 13px;padding-right: 108px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Europeiska gemenskapen freskriver. Varje organs ansvarsomrde ska anges.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 13px;padding-right: 104px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Generalsekreteraren ska publicera en lista ver organen, deras identifika- tionsnummer och ansvars- omrde, samt ska hlla listan uppdaterad.</P>
<P style="text-align: right;margin-top: 5px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft0">1021</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_368" style="position:relative; overflow: hidden;margin: 53px 0px 79px 29px;padding: 0px;border: none;width: 595px;">


<DIV style="border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 515px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p24 ft0">Prop. 2021/22:83</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 1px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">6 Tout Etat partie garantit la surveillance adquate des organismes mentionns au  2 et retire sa comptence  tout organisme ne rem- plissant plus les critres prvus au  3, auquel cas il en informe sans dlai le Secrtaire gnral.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 31px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">7 Un Etat partie qui considre quune autorit</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">dvaluation<SPAN style="padding-left:59px;">ou dhomologation dun autre Etat partie, ou quun orga- nisme auquel il a transfr sa comptence, ne remplit pas les critres noncs au  3, peut porter laffaire devant la Commission dexperts tech- niques qui, dans les quatre mois, informe lEtat partie en question des changements de toutes natures auxquels il conviendra de procder pour que lorganisme conserve le statut qui lui a t confr. En relation avec ce qui prcde, la Commission dexperts techniques peut dcider dordonner  lEtat partie de suspendre ou de retirer les homologations dlivres sur la base des travaux effectus par lorganisme ou lautorit en question.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 1px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 122px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">6 A Contracting State shall ensure the consistent supervi- sion of the bodies indicated in</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 5px;line-height: 13px;">2 and shall withdraw the competence from a body which no longer meets the criteria referred to in  3, in which case it shall immedi- ately inform the Secretary General thereof.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 19px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">7 Should a Contracting State consider that an assessing or approving au- thority of another Con- tracting State, or a body having competence trans- ferred from it, does not meet the criteria of  3, the matter shall be transferred to the Committee of Technical Experts which, within four months, shall inform the</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 4px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Contracting State in question of any changes that are necessary for the body to retain the status conferred upon it. In relation to this, the Committee of Technical Experts may decide to instruct the Contracting State to suspend or withdraw approvals made on the basis of work done by the body or by the authority in question.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 1px 0px 0px 12px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">6 Varje deltagande stat ska se till att utva tillsyn ver organen som anges i  2 och fr det fall ett organ inte uppfyller kraven i  3 terkalla befogenheten frn det organet. I ett sdant fall</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 5px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">ska staten omedelbart underrtta generalsekrete- raren om detta.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 13px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">7 Om en deltagande stat skulle anse att en bedm- nings- eller godknnande- myndighet i en annan del- tagande stat, eller ett organ som har ftt sin befogenhet frn det, inte uppfyller kraven i  3 ska frgan lggas fram i tekniska expertutskottet som, inom fyra mnader, ska under- rtta den aktuella deltagan- de staten om vilka ndringar p organet som r ndvnd- iga fr att det ska behlla sin status. I samband hrmed fr tekniska expertutskottet besluta att beordra den deltagande staten att tills vidare upphva eller ter- kalla godknnanden som grundar sig p arbete utfrt av organet eller myndig- heten i frga.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 20px 0px 0px 141px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 454px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 221px;overflow: hidden;">
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 style="width: 221px;font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';">
<TR>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Article 6</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 87px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Article 6</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr0"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p3">Validit des certificats</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 87px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr0"><P style="font: italic 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 12px;" class="p3">Validity of technical</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">techniques</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 87px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">certificates</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 3px 0px 0px 47px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 186px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p24">Artikel 6</P>
<P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p24">Tekniska intygs giltighet</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 15px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 535px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 201px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 141px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p24 ft0">1022</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 Les certificats techniques dlivrs par lautorit com- ptente dun Etat partie con- formment aux prsentes Rgles uniformes sont valides dans tous les autres Etats parties. Toutefois, la circu- lation et lutilisation sur le territoire de ces autres Etats sont rgies par les conditions spcifies dans le prsent article.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 18px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">2 Une admission  lexploitation permet aux entreprises de transport ferro-</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 Technical certificates is- sued by the competent au- thority of a Contracting State in accordance with these Uniform Rules, shall be valid in all the other Contracting States. How- ever the circulation and use on the territories of those other States shall be subject to the conditions specified in this Article.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 18px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft225">2 An admission to operation allows the rail transport undertakings to</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">1 Tekniska intyg som ut- frdats i enlighet med dessa enhetliga rttsregler av den behriga myndigheten i en deltagande stat, ska vara giltiga i alla vriga deltagande stater. Spridningen och anvndningen p dessa staters territorium ska dock vara understllda de villkor som anges i denna artikel.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 31px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">2 Ett godknnande fr drift tillter endast jrnvgs- fretaget att nyttja fordonet</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_369" style="position:relative; overflow: hidden;margin: 53px 0px 79px 75px;padding: 0px;border: none;width: 549px;">


<DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 135px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2036">viaire dexploiter un vhicule uniquement sur les infrastruc- tures compatibles avec ce vhicule conformment  ses spcifications et aux autres conditions dadmission; il incombe  lentreprise de transport ferroviaire de sen assurer.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 19px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 4px;line-height: 13px;">3 Sans prjudice de lar- ticle 3a, une admission  lexploitation dlivre pour un vhicule conforme  lensemble des PTU appli- cables permet  ce vhicule de circuler librement sur le territoire dautres Etats par- ties  condition que</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">toutes les exigences essentielles soient cou- vertes dans ces PTU et</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 15px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">le vhicule ne soit pas sujet </SPAN></P>
<P class="p1445 ft205"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Arial';line-height: 14px;">-</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 20px;line-height: 14px;">un cas spcifique ou</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 15px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft205"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Arial';line-height: 14px;">-</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 20px;line-height: 14px;">des points ouverts relatifs  la compati- bilit technique avec linfrastructure ou</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Arial';line-height: 14px;">-</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 20px;line-height: 14px;">une drogation.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">Les conditions de libre cir- culation peuvent tre gale- ment spcifies dans les PTU concernes.</P>
<P style="text-align: right;padding-left: 19px;padding-right: 15px;margin-top: 12px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -19px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">4 a) Si, dans un Etat partie, une admission</SPAN></P>
<P class="p2022 ft205"> lexploitation a t</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 15px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft218">dlivre pour un vhi- cule qui</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Arial';line-height: 13px;">-</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 20px;line-height: 13px;">est sujet  un cas spcifique,  un point ouvert relatif  la com-</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft204">patibilit technique avec linfrastructure ou</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"> une drogation, ou</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 11px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Arial';line-height: 13px;">-</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 20px;line-height: 13px;">nest pas conforme aux PTU relatives au matriel roulant et </SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 15px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">toutes autres disposi- tions pertinentes, ou</P>
<P class="p1445 ft205"><SPAN class="ft204">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 14px;">si toutes les exigences</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: right;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">essentielles ne sont pas couvertes dans les PTU, les autorits comptentes</P>
<P class="p1445 ft205">des autres Etats peuvent</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 1px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 134px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2036">operate a vehicle only on infrastructures compatible with the vehicle according to its specifications and other conditions of the admission; it is the respon- sibility of the rail transport undertaking to ensure this.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 32px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 8px;line-height: 13px;">3 Without prejudice to Article 3a an admission to operation issued for a vehicle which is in conformity with all applicable UTP shall permit the vehicle free circulation on the territories of other Contracting States provided that</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">all essential require- ments are covered in these UTP and</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">the vehicle is not subject to</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1694 ft205"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Arial';line-height: 14px;">-</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 20px;line-height: 14px;">a specific case or</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft205"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Arial';line-height: 14px;">-</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 20px;line-height: 14px;">open points that are related to technical compatibility with the infrastructure or</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Arial';line-height: 14px;">-</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 20px;line-height: 14px;">a derogation.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">The conditions for the free circulation may also be specified in the relevant UTP.</P>
<P style="text-align: right;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 11px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 4px;line-height: 13px;">4 a) Where in a Con- tracting State an ad- mission to operation</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft218">has been issued for a vehicle which is</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 4px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Arial';line-height: 13px;">-</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 20px;line-height: 13px;">subject to a specific case, an open point which is related to the technical compatibility with the infrastructure or a derogation, or</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 15px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Arial';line-height: 13px;">-</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 20px;line-height: 13px;">not in conformity with the UTP on rolling stock and all other relevant provisions, or</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1531 ft205"><SPAN class="ft204">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 14px;">where not all essential</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft204">requirements are cov- ered in the UTP,</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft204">the competent authorities of the other States may ask the</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 130px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 10px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">p infrastruktur som r kompatibel med fordonet i enlighet med fordonets specifikationer och andra krav i godknnandet; det r jrnvgsfretagets ansvar att tillse detta.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 9px;margin-top: 46px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 9px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 9px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">3 Utan tillmpning av artik- el 3a, ska ett godknnande fr drift som utfrdats fr ett fordon som r i verensstm- melse med den tillmpliga UTP:n innebra att fordonet tillts att fritt rra sig p andra deltagande staters territorium under frutsttning att</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 10px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">alla vsentliga krav r uppfyllda i dessa UTP:er och</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 10px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">fordonet inte r freml fr</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1694 ft205"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Arial';line-height: 14px;">-</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 20px;line-height: 14px;">ett specialfall eller</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 9px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft204"><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Arial';line-height: 13px;">-</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 20px;line-height: 12px;">ppna punkter som hnfr sig till den tek- niska kompatibiliteten</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 10px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">med infrastrukturen eller</P>
<P class="p1445 ft205"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Arial';line-height: 14px;">-</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 20px;line-height: 14px;">ett undantag.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 10px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">Villkor fr den fria rrlig- heten kan ocks vara speci- ficerade i den relevanta UTP:n.</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 9px;margin-top: 13px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 4px;line-height: 13px;">4 a) Om det i en deltagande stat har utfrdats ett godknnande fr drift fr ett fordon som r</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 9px;margin-top: 13px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -23px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Arial';line-height: 14px;">- </SPAN>freml fr ett special- fall, en ppen punkt som hnfr sig till den</P>
<P class="p2022 ft205">tekniska kom-</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 10px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">patibiliteten med infrastrukturen eller ett undantag eller</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 9px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -23px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Arial';line-height: 14px;">- </SPAN>inte i verensstm- melse med UTP:n om rullande materiel och alla andra relevanta bestmmelser eller</P>
<P class="p1445 ft205"><SPAN class="ft204">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 14px;">om inte alla vsentliga</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 10px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">krav r tckta av UTP:n,</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-right: 9px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft204">kan de behriga myndighet- erna i andra stater frga</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 1px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 150px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p24 ft0">Prop. 2021/22:83</P>
<P style="text-align: right;padding-right: 51px;margin-top: 752px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft0">1023</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_370" style="position:relative; overflow: hidden;margin: 53px 0px 79px 29px;padding: 0px;border: none;width: 595px;">


<DIV style="border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 575px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p24 ft0">Prop. 2021/22:83</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 1px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 134px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2036">demander au demandeur de leur fournir des informa- tions techniques addition- nelles telles quune analyse de risque ou des tests du vhicule avant de lui oc- troyer une admission  lexploitation complmen- taire.</P>
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2127">Pour la partie du vhicule conforme  une PTU ou  une partie dune PTU, les autorits comptentes doi- vent accepter les vrifica- tions effectues par dautres</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">autorits comptentes conformment aux PTU. Pour lautre partie du</P>
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2127">vhicule, les autorits comptentes doivent pren- dre pleinement en compte le tableau dquivalence prvu</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 7px;line-height: 13px;">larticle 13 des Rgles uniformes APTU.</SPAN></P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1445">Le respect</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 9px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 9px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">de dispositions iden- tiques et de dispositions dclares quivalentes,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 13px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">e)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">de dispositions qui ne sont pas lies  un cas spcifique et</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 13px;">de dispositions qui ne sont pas lies  la</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">compatibilit tech-</P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1446">nique<SPAN style="padding-left:53px;">avec</SPAN></P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1446">linfrastructure,</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">ne fait pas lobjet dune nouvelle valuation.</P>
<P class="p1531 ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft225">5 Les  2  4 sappliquent</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">par analogie  une admission de type de construction.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 1px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 134px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2036">applicant for additional technical information such as risk analysis and/or vehi- cle tests before granting a complementary admission to operation.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 42px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">For the part of the vehicle which is compliant with a UTP or part of it, the competent authorities have to accept verifications that have been made by other competent authorities ac- cording to the UTP. For the other part of the vehicle the competent authorities shall take full account of the equivalence table referred to in Article 13 of the APTU Uniform Rules.</P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1439">The fulfilment of</P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p24"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">identical provisions and</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">provisions declared equivalent,</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 12px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft204"><SPAN class="ft204">e)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 12px;">provisions not related to a specific case and</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 13px;">provisions not related to the technical com- patibility with infra- structure,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1632 ft205">shall not be assessed again.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 28px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft225">5  2 to 4 shall apply mutatis mutandis to an admission of a type of construction.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 1px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 186px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">skanden om ytterligare teknisk information, ssom riskanalys och/eller for- donstest innan de beviljar ett kompletterande godkn- nande fr drift.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 36px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Fr den del av fordonet som r i enlighet med en UTP eller delar av en sdan,</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">mste den behriga myndigheten acceptera de kontroller som andra beh- riga myndigheter gjort i enlighet med UTP:n. Fr den andra delen av fordonet ska den behriga myndig- heten ta hnsyn till den jmfrelsetabell som anges i artikel 13 i de enhetliga rttsreglerna APTU.</P>
<P style="text-align: left;margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Uppfyllelsen av</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 14px;line-height: 13px;">identiska bestmmel- ser och bestmmelser som frklarats likvr- diga,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 65px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">e)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">bestmmelrser som inte hnfr sig till specialfall och</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">bestmmelser som inte hnfr sig till den tekniska kompatibili- teten med infrastruk-</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">turen</P>
<P class="p1445 ft205">ska inte bedmas p nytt.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 65px;margin-top: 28px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 14px;">5 </SPAN><NOBR>24</NOBR>  ska tillmpas ocks p godknnande av typkonstruktion.</P>
</DIV>

<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 4px;line-height: 13px;">1 Les valuations, dclara- tions et autre documentation ralises conformment aux prsentes Rgles uniformes sont reconnues comme preuves rfutables par les autorits et organismes comptents, les entreprises de</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 Assessments, declara- tions and other documenta- tion made according to these Uniform Rules shall be recognised at face value by the authorities and competent bodies, the rail transport undertakings, the</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">1 Bedmningar, frklaring- ar och annan dokumentation som gjorts i enlighet med dessa enhetliga rttsregler ska erknnas ssom oveder- sgliga av myndigheter och behriga organ, jrnvgs- fretag, innehavare och</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_371" style="position:relative; overflow: hidden;margin: 54px 0px 79px 75px;padding: 0px;border: none;width: 549px;">


<DIV style="border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 492px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 135px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2036">transport ferroviaire, les dtenteurs et les gestionnaires dinfrastructure dans tous les Etats parties.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 17px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">2 Si une exigence ou une disposition a t reconnue quivalente conformment</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1445 ft205"> larticle 13 des Rgles</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 15px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">uniformes APTU, les valuations et tests associs qui ont t dj effectus et documents, ne sont pas rpts.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">keepers and the infrastruc- ture managers in all the Contracting States.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">2 If a requirement or a provision has been declared as equivalent in accordance with Article 13 of the APTU</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Uniform Rules related assessments and tests which have already been carried out and documented shall not be repeated.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 223px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p24 ft205">infrastrukturfrvaltare i alla <SPAN class="ft0">Prop. 2021/22:83 </SPAN>deltagande stater.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 98px;margin-top: 38px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">2 Om ett krav eller en bestmmelse har frklarats likvrdig i enlighet med artikel 13 i de enhetliga rttsreglerna i APTU ska inte de bedmningar och tester som redan gjorts gras om.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>

	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr0"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p3">Recognition of technical</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 103px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr0"><P style="font: italic 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 12px;" class="p3">Erknnande av tekniska</P></TD>

	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 135px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr17"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">techniques et fonctionnels</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr17"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">and operational tests</P></TD>

<DIV style="border:none;margin: 12px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 394px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 122px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">La Commission dexperts techniques peut adopter des rgles destines  tre incluses dans une Annexe aux prsentes Rgles uniformes et des spcifications destines  tre incluses dans une ou plusieurs PTU concernant les dispositions relatives aux inspections techniques, aux fichiers de relev de main- tenance des vhicules admis et aux tests fonctionnels tels que les essais de freinage de train, et leur reconnaissance mutuelle.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 9px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">The Committee of Technical Experts may adopt rules for inclusion in an Annex to these</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Uniform Rules and requirements for inclusion in one or more UTP concerning the provisions for and the mutual recognition of tech- nical inspections, main- tenance record files for the ad- mitted vehicles and operation- al tests such as train braking tests.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 125px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">Tekniska expertutskottet fr anta regler som ska infras i en bilaga till dessa enhetliga rttsregler och krav som ska infras i en eller flera UTP:er som rr be- stmmelser om och det m- sesidiga erknnandet av tek- niska inspektioner, jour- naler fr underhllshistorik fr godknda fordon och driftstest ssom bromsprov.</P>

<DIV style="border:none;margin: 11px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 549px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 2px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 135px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">1 Pour tre admis  la circulation en trafic inter- national, les vhicules ferro- viaires doivent rpondre:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1445 ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 14px;">aux PTU et</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">si elles sont applicab- les, aux dispositions contenues dans le RID.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 27px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">2 En labsence de PTU applicables au </SPAN><NOBR>sous-sys-</NOBR> tme, ladmission technique</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 15px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">est fonde sur les spcifications techniques nationales applicables qui sont en vigueur, confor- mment  larticle 12 des</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 2px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 134px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2036"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 In order to be admitted to circulation in interna- tional traffic, railway vehi- cles must satisfy</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1445 ft205"><SPAN class="ft204">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 14px;">the UTP and</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft204">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 14px;">where applicable, the provisions contained in RID.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 24px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">2 In the absence of UTP applicable to the subsystem, the technical admission shall be based on the applicable national tech- nical requirements in force according to Article 12 of the APTU Uniform Rules in</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 280px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 155px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 Fr att godknnas fr nyttjande i internationell trafik ska jrnvgsfordonen uppfylla</SPAN></P>
<P class="p25 ft205"><SPAN class="ft204">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 14px;">UTP:n och</SPAN></P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p24"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">om det r tillmpligt,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 160px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">bestmmelserna i RID.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 155px;margin-top: 25px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">2 Om det inte finns ngra bestmmelser i UTP:erna som r tillmpliga p del- systemet, ska det tekniska godknnandet grundas p tillmpliga nationella tekn- iska krav som r gllande</SPAN></P>
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 style="width: 229px;margin-top: 3px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';">

<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 145px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">des Rgles uniformes APTU.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 4px 0px 0px 14px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 134px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">the Contracting State in which an application for technical admission is made.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 13px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">3 If the UTP do not cover all essential requirements or in the case of specific cases or open points, the technical admission shall be based on</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 14px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">e)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">the provisions con- tained in the UTP,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft204">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 14px;">where applicable, the provisions contained in RID and</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1443 ft205">h) applicable national</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">technical require- ments in force ac- cording to Article 12 of the APTU Uniform Rules.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 4px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p1583 ft205">enhetliga rttsreglerna APTU i den deltagande stat dr anskan om tekniskt godknnande grs.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 13px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 14px;">3 Om inte UTP:n tcker alla vsentliga krav eller vid specialfall eller ppna punkter, ska det tekniska godknnandet grundas p</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 5px;margin-top: 9px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -23px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">d) bestmmelserna i UTP:n</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">e)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 14px;">nr det r tillmpligt, bestmmelserna i RID</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 25px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 14px;">tillmpliga nationella tekniska krav som r gllande i enlighet med artikel 12 i de enhetliga rttsreglerna APTU.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>

<DIV style="border:none;margin: 15px 0px 0px 141px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 394px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">La Commission dexperts techniques adopte des direc- tives ou dispositions obliga- toires concernant les dro- gations aux dispositions de larticle 7 et les mthodes dvaluation qui peuvent tre ou sont utilises.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">The Committee of Technical Experts shall adopt guidelines or mandatory provisions for</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">derogations from the provisions of Article 7 and for the assessment methods that may or shall be used.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">Tekniska expertutskottet ska anta riktlinjer eller tvingande regler fr undantag frn artikel 7 och fr de bedm- ningsmetoder som fr eller ska anvndas.</P>
</DIV>

<DIV style="border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 492px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 3px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 122px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 9px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 9px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">2 Ladmission de linfra- structure et la surveillance de sa maintenance demeurent rgies par les dispositions en vigueur dans lEtat partie dans lequel se situe linfrastructure.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 18px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 14px;">3 Les articles 7 et 7a sappliquent par analogie  linfrastructure.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 3px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">2 Admission of infrastruc- ture and supervision of its maintenance remain subject to the provisions in force in the Contracting State in which the infrastructure is located.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 18px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft225">3 Article 7 and 7a shall apply mutatis mutandis to infrastructure.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 223px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p24"> 2 P godknnande av infra- <SPAN class="ft215">Prop. 2021/22:83 </SPAN>struktur och p tillsyn av un-</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 98px;margin-top: 4px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">derhllet av infrastrukturen ska bestmmelserna i den del- tagande stat dr infra- strukturen finns tillmpas.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 103px;margin-top: 17px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft225">3 Artikel 7 och 7a r tillmpliga ocks p infra- struktur.</SPAN></P>

<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 2px 0px 0px 15px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 The rail transport undertakings which operate railway vehicles admitted to circulation in international traffic shall be required to</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">comply with the prescriptions relating to the operation of a vehicle in international traffic, speci- fied in the UTP.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 2px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 125px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 De jrnvgsfretag som nyttjar ett jrnvgsfordon som r godknt fr nyttj- ande i internationell trafik ska vara skyldiga att flja de freskrifter fr drift av ett fordon i internationell trafik som terfinns i UTP:n.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 3px 0px 0px 15px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 6px;line-height: 13px;">2 The undertakings and administrations which man- age infrastructure in the Contracting States, includ- ing operational safety and control systems, intended and suitable for operation in international traffic, shall be required to comply with the</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">technical prescriptions specified in the UTP and satisfy them permanently in respect of the construction and the management of that infrastructure.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 3px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 280px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p24 ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft225">2 De fretag eller myndig-</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 155px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">heter som frvaltar infrastruktur i de deltagande staterna, inbegripet sk- erhets- och trafiklednings- systemen, som r avsedd och lmpad att nyttjas i internationell trafik, ska vara skyldiga att flja de tekniska freskrifterna i UTP:n och alltid uppfylla dem vid uppbyggnad eller frvaltning av denna infra- struktur.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 12px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 384px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 1px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 135px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p24">Article 10</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-right: 30px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;">Demande et octroi de certificats techniques, dclarations et conditions affrentes</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 249px;overflow: hidden;">
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 style="width: 249px;font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';">
<TR>

<DIV style="border:none;margin: 11px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 498px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">1 Loctroi dun certificat technique est attach au type de construction dun vhicule ferroviaire ou au vhicule ferroviaire pro- prement dit.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 28px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 14px;">2 Une demande de certificat technique peut tre faite par:</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 14px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 The grant of a technical certificate shall be related to the type of construction of a railway vehicle or to the railway vehicle itself.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 28px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft225">2 An application for a technical certificate may be made by:</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 242px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 13px;padding-right: 104px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 Beviljandet av ett tek- niskt intyg ska vara kopplat till ett jrnvgsfordons kon- struktionstyp eller till jrn- vgsfordonet sjlvt.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 13px;padding-right: 109px;margin-top: 28px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft225">2 Anskan om tekniskt intyg kan inges av</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: right;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft0">1027</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 15px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"> 3 La demande de certificat technique, y compris les dclarations appropries, peut tre faite auprs de toute autorit comptente ou de tout organisme de lun des Etas parties, dans le cadre des comptences prvues  lar- ticle 5.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 18px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"> 4 Si larticle 6,  4 sapplique au vhicule, le demandeur indique les Etats parties (ou, le cas chant, les lignes) pour lesquels les certificats techniques sont requis de manire  garantir la libre circulation; dans ce cas, les autorits et les</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 141px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">organismes dvaluation</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">comptents doivent cooprer de faon  faciliter le processus pour le demandeur.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"> 5 Lensemble des frais occasionns par le proces- sus dadmission est sup- port par le demandeur, sauf disposition contraire des lois et prescriptions en vigueur dans lEtat dans lequel ladmission est oc- troye. Lexcution dad- missions techniques aux fins de profit est prohibe.</P>

<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 4px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 134px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p24 ft205"><SPAN class="ft204">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 14px;">the manufacturer,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">g)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">a rail tranport underta- king,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">h)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">the keeper of the vehicle,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">i)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 13px;">the owner of the vehicle.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">j)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 14px;">the infrastructure manager.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 12px;margin-top: 14px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">3 The application for a technical certificate, including appropriate declarations, may be made to any competent authority or body within its competence referred to in Article 5, of one of the Contracting States.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 31px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">4 If Article 6  4 applies to the vehicle, the applicant shall indicate the Con- tracting States (if applicable the lines) for which the technical certificates are required to permit free circulation; in this case the competent authorities and assessing bodies involved should cooperate in order to make the process easier for the applicant.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 31px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">5 All costs arising from the admission process shall be covered by the applicant, unless provided otherwise according to the laws and prescriptions in force in the State where the approval is</SPAN></P>
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2127">granted. Carrying out technical admissions for profit shall not be permitted.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 29px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft225">5a All decisions, assess- ments, tests etc. shall be carried out in a </SPAN><NOBR>non-dis-</NOBR> criminatory way.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 13px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">6 The applicant shall elaborate and attach to his application a Technical File and a Maintenance File containing the information required in the UTP. The</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 4px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 186px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p24 ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 14px;">tillverkaren,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p24 ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">g)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 14px;line-height: 14px;">ett jrnvgsfretag,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1512 ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">h)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 14px;line-height: 14px;">jrnvgsfordonets</SPAN></P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1446">innehavare,</P>
<P class="p24 ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">i)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 14px;">fordonets gare,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 71px;margin-top: 13px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft204"><SPAN class="ft204">j)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 12px;">infrastrukturfrvalt- aren.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 17px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">3 Anskan om tekniskt intyg, inklusive lmpliga frklaringar, kan inges till en myndighet eller ett behrigt organ i ngon av de deltagande staterna, som r behrig enligt artikel 5.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 45px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">4 Om artikel 6  4 r tillmplig p fordonet, ska skanden ange de deltagande stater (eller, om det r tillmpligt, linjer) i vilka de tekniska intygen krvs fr att tillta fri rrlighet; i detta fall ska de behriga myndighet- erna och organen som in- volverats samarbeta fr att underltta frfarandet fr skanden.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 41px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">5 Skanden ska svara fr alla kostnader fr godknn- andefrfarandet, om inte gllande lagar och fre- skrifter i den stat dr god- knnandet beviljas fre- skriver ngot annat. Det r inte tilltet att gra vinst p att utfra tekniska godknn- anden.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 65px;margin-top: 35px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 14px;">5a Alla beslut, bedm- ningar, tester etc. ska utfras p ett </SPAN><NOBR>icke-diskri-</NOBR> minerande stt.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 12px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">6 Skanden ska ta fram och bifoga det tekniska underlaget och en under- hllsjournal som innehller den information som krvs enligt UTP:n till sin ans-</SPAN></P>
</DIV>

<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 2px 0px 0px 14px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">assessing body shall check, correct and add appropriate information to these files in order that the files reflect the properties of the vehicle.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 31px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 13px;line-height: 13px;">7 Every assessment carried out shall be docu- mented by the assessor in an Assessment Report which</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">shall substantiate the assessments carried out</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">hereby, stating which provisions the object has been assessed against and whether the object passed or failed this assessment.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 12px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">8 A person who applies for a Certificate of Operation by the simplified procedure of technical admission (Article 4</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 5px;line-height: 13px;">1, b)), shall attach to his application the Design Type Certificate, established in accordance with Article 11</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">2, and demonstrate in an appropriate manner that the vehicles for which he is applying for a Certificate of Operation correspond to that type of construction.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 223px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p24">kan. Bedmningsorganet <SPAN class="ft215">Prop. 2021/22:83 </SPAN>ska kontrollera, rtta och</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 103px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">lgga till lmplig inform- ation till dessa dokument s att de avspeglar fordonets egenskaper.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 97px;margin-top: 13px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">7 Varje bedmning som utfrs ska dokumenteras av bedmningsorganet i en bedmningsrapport, som ska motivera bedmningarna som utfrts samt ange de bestmmelser som legat till grund fr bedmningen och om fremlet fr bedm- ningen godknts eller inte.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 97px;margin-top: 32px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">8 Den som ansker om driftsintyg enligt det frenk- lade frfrandet fr tekniskt godknnande (artikel 4  1 b), ska till sin anskan foga in- tyget om konstruktionstyp, upprttat i enlighet med artikel 11  2, och p lmpligt stt visa att de fordon fr vilka han ansker om driftsintyg motsvarar denna konstruk- tionstyp</SPAN></P>

<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 6px;line-height: 13px;">9 A technical certificate shall be granted in principle for an unlimited period; it can be general or limited in scope.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 17px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 5px;line-height: 13px;">10 If relevant provisions in the prescriptions ac- cording to Article 7 on the basis of which a type of con- struction has been admitted have been changed, and if no relevant transitional provisions can be applied, the Contracting State in which the corresponding Design Type Certificate has been issued, and after consultation of the other States where the Certificate is valid according to Article 6, shall decide whether the Certificate may remain valid or need to be renewed.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 2px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 229px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 109px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 4px;line-height: 14px;">9 Ett tekniskt intyg ska i princip beviljas p obe- stmd tid; det kan vara allmnt eller begrnsat till sin omfattning.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 103px;margin-top: 12px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">10 Om de aktuella be- stmmelserna i freskrifterna enligt artikel 7 i enlighet med vilka en konstruktionstyp har godknts, har ndrats och det inte finns ngon tillmplig vergngsbestmmelse, ska den deltagande staten i vilken motsvarande konstruktions- typsintyg har utfrdats, och efter att ha konsulterat de andra stater dr intyget r giltigt enligt artikel 6, besluta om intyget r giltigt eller behver frnyas. De kriterier som ska kontrolleras vid ett frnyat typgodknnande fr</SPAN></P>
