<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 121px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 9px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">dispositions modifies. Ledit renouvellement naffecte pas les admissions  lexploitation dj octroyes sur la base de types prcdemment admis.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 4px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">The criteria which shall be checked in the case of a renewed type admission may only concern the changed provisions. The renewal of the type admis- sion does not affect admis- sions to operation already granted on the basis of previously admitted types.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 4px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">bestmmelserna. Frnyelsen av typgodknnandet pverkar inte godknnanden fr drift som redan beviljats p grundval av tidigare god- knda typer.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 19px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 535px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 275px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"> 11 En cas de renouvelle- ment ou de ramnagement, lentit adjudicatrice ou le constructeur envoie  lEtat partie concern un dossier dcrivant le projet. LEtat partie examine ce dossier et, prenant en compte la stratgie de mise en oeuvre figurant dans les PTU</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">applicables, dcide si ltendue des travaux est telle quune nouvelle ad- mission  lexploitation au sens des prsentes Rgles uniformes est ncessaire.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 18px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Une nouvelle admission  lexploitation est ncessaire dans tous les cas o le niveau de scurit gnral du sous- systme concern peut tre affect de manire ngative par les travaux envisags. Si une nouvelle admission est ncessaire, lEtat partie dcide dans quelle mesure les dispositions des PTU aff- rentes doivent tre appliques au projet.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 4px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">LEtat partie prend sa dcision au plus tard dans les quatre mois suivant la soumission du dossier com- plet par le demandeur.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Lorsquune nouvelle admis- sion est ncessaire et si les PTU ne sont pas pleinement appliques, lEtat partie notifie au Secrtaire gnral</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 165px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 28px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -23px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">d) la raison pour laquelle une PTU nest pas pleinement applique,</P>
<P class="p1435 ft0">1030</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 122px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">11 In the event of renewal or upgrading, the contract- ing entity or the manufac- turer shall send the Con- tracting State concerned a file describing the project. The Contracting State shall examine this file and, taking account of the implemen- tation strategy indicated in the applicable UTP, shall decide whether the extent of the work means that a new admission to operation within the meaning of these Uniform Rules is needed.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 19px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Such a new admission to operation shall be required whenever the overall safety level of the subsystem concerned may be adversely affected by the work envis- aged. If a new admission is needed, the Contracting State shall decide to what extent the provisions in the related UTP need to be applied to the project.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 33px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">The Contracting State shall take its decision not later than four months after submission of the complete file by the applicant.</P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1742">When a new admission is required and if the UTP are not fully applied, the Contracting States shall notify to the Secretary General</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft204"><SPAN class="ft204">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 12px;">the reason why a UTP is not fully applied,</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 12px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">11 Vid modernisering eller ombyggnad ska den kontrakt- erade enheten eller tillverka- ren skicka underlag som beskriver projektet till den deltagande staten. Den deltag- ande staten ska underska detta underlag och, med hn- syn tagen till den strategi fr genomfrande som anges i den tillmpliga UTP:n, be- sluta huruvida omfattningen av arbetet innebr att ett nytt godknnande fr drift i enlighet med dessa enhetliga rttsregler behvs.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 19px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Sdant nytt godknnande fr drift ska krvas nr helst den vergripande skerhetsnivn p det aktuella delsystemet kan pverkas negativt av det tnkta arbetet. Om ett nytt godknnande krvs, ska den deltagande staten besluta i vilken omfattning bestm- melserna i den aktuella UTP:n ska tillmpas p projektet.</P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1827">Den deltagande staten ska fatta sitt beslut inte senare n fyra mnader frn det att skanden ingett ett full- stndigt underlag.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 5px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Nr det krvs ett nytt god- knnande och om UTP:n inte tillmpas fullt ut ska den deltagande staten informera generalsekreteraren om</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 14px;line-height: 14px;">sklet till att UTP:n inte tillmpas fullt ut,</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_377" style="position:relative; overflow: hidden;margin: 52px 0px 79px 75px;padding: 0px;border: none;width: 549px;">


<DIV style="border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 549px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 135px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 15px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -23px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">e) les caractristiques techniques applicables en lieu et place des PTU et</P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p25"><SPAN class="ft204">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 13px;">les organismes res-</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 15px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">ponsables de la fourniture des infor- mations requises sous a) et b).</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Le Secrtaire gnral publie linformation notifie sur le site Web de lOrganisation.</P>
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2108"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">12 Le  11 sapplique par analogie  un certificat de type de conception et  toute dclaration concernant la construction ou les lments de construction en question.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">e)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">the technical char- acteristics applicable in place of the UTP and</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 4px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 13px;">the bodies responsible for providing the information required under a) and b).</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 14px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">The Secretary General shall publish the notified infor- mation on the website of the Organisation.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 4px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">12  11 applies mutatis mutandis to a Design Type Certificate and to any declaration concerning the construction or the elements of construction in question.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 280px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 57px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">e)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">de tekniska knne- </SPAN><SPAN class="ft215">Prop. 2021/22:83 </SPAN>tecknen som tillmpas</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">i stllet fr UTP:n och</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 155px;margin-top: 13px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft204">f)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 17px;line-height: 14px;">de organ som ansvarar fr den information som krvs under a) och b).</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 155px;margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">Generalsekreteraren ska publicera informationen p organisationens hemsida.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 154px;margin-top: 14px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">12  11 tillmpas ocks p konstruktionstypsintyg och varje frklaring som rr konstruktionen eller delarna i den aktuella konstruktionen.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 14px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 384px;overflow: hidden;">

	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Article 10a</P></TD>

<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 2px 0px 0px 15px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 If a competent authority of a Contracting State other than the one which has granted the (first) admission to operation discovers non- compliance it shall, with all details, inform the (first) admitting authority; if the </SPAN><NOBR>non-compliance</NOBR> relates to a Design Type Certificate, the authority which issued it shall also be informed.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 2px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 125px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p24"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 Om en behrig myn- dighet i en annan deltagande stat n den stat som beviljat (det frsta) godknnandet fr drift upptcker att det inte efterlevs, ska den underrtta (den frsta) godknnandemyndigheten om samtliga detaljer; om den bristande efterlevnaden</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 5px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">hnfr sig till ett konstruktionstypsintyg ska ocks utfrdande myndighet underrttas.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 11px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 498px;overflow: hidden;">

<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -23px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Arial';line-height: 14px;">- </SPAN>prescriptions conte- nues dans les PTU et dans les spcifications nationales applicables qui sont en vigueur</P>

<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 199px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p24">nr tillmpliga nation- <SPAN class="ft215">Prop. 2021/22:83 </SPAN>ella bestmmelser som</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 97px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">gller enligt artikel 12 i de enhetliga rttsreg- lerna APTU eller deras tillknnagivna motsva- righeter enligt artikel 13 i de enhetliga rtts- reglerna APTU inte fljs. Intygets giltighet ska upphvas i de(n) aktuella deltagande stat- e(r)n(a).</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>

	<TD colspan=5 class="tr0 td221"><P class="p2253 ft204">the Maintenance</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=7 class="tr0 td24"><P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p5">inte r den aktuella inne-</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD colspan=4 class="tr25 td147"><P class="p3 ft205">pas du dtenteur</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr25 td120"><P class="p2253 ft205">actuel, le</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=3 class="tr25 td113"><P class="p5 ft205">File), if</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr25 td179"><P class="p3 ft136">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr25 td26"><P class="p2241 ft205">not</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 21px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P class="p3 ft205">the</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr25 td80"><P class="p2253 ft204">current</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr25 td59"><P class="p5 ft205">havaren,</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 27px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P class="p28 ft204">utan</P></TD>

</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 4px 0px 0px 14px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">keeper, shall without delay hand it over to the current keeper together with the Maintenance Record File and make available all (additional) detailed in- structions for maintenance and operations that are still in his possession.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 19px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">9  8 applies mutatis mutandis to vehicles and railway material admitted according to Article 19, whereby the documentation in question is the approval documentation and any other documentation con- taining any information similar to what is included in the requirements for the Technical File, Mainten- ance File and Maintenance Record File, whether in full or in part.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 4px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">verlmna intyget till den aktuella innehavaren till- sammans med journalen fr underhllshistorik och till- gngliggra alla (ytterligare) detaljerade instruktioner av- seende underhll och drift som han fortfarande har i sin besittning.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 19px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">9  8 tillmpas ocks p fordon och jrnvgsmateriel som godknts enligt artikel 19, dr dokumentationen i</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">frga r godknnande- dokumentationen och varje annan dokumentation som innehller information som liknar den som anges i kraven fr det tekniska underlaget,</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 5px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">underhllsjournalen och journalen fr underhlls- historik, antingen helt eller delvis.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 15px 0px 0px 141px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 353px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 206px;overflow: hidden;">
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 style="width: 206px;font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';">
<TR>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr3"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Article 12</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td159"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Article 12</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr3"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Modles uniformes</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr3 td159"><P style="font: italic 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 12px;" class="p3">Uniform formats</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 2px 0px 0px 62px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 85px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: italic 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 12px;" class="p24">Artikel 12 Enhetliga frlagor</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 14px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 595px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 275px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"> 1 LOrganisation prescrit des modles uniformes des certificats mentionns  larticle 11, des dclarations dcides conformment  larticle 4,  2 et du rapport dvaluation conformment  larticle 10,  7.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"> 2 Les modles sont labors et adopts par la Commission dexperts tech- niques.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"> 3 La Commission dexperts techniques peut dcider dautoriser des certificats et dclarations faits sur un autre modle spcifi que celui pre- scrit dans les Rgles uni- formes, mais qui contient les informations requises con- formment  larticle 11, pour quils soient reconnus en tant que substituts quivalents.</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 141px;margin-top: 4px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;">Article 13</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 141px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;">Registres</P>
<P class="p1445 ft0">1036</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 134px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 12px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 The Organisation shall prescribe uniform formats of the certificates indicated in Article 11, of the declarations decided according to Article 4</SPAN></P>
<P class="p2094 ft125"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft166">2 and of the Assessment Report according to Article 10</SPAN></P>
<P class="p25 ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft225">7.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 13px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft225">2 The formats shall be prepared and adopted by the Committee of Technical Experts.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 12px;margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">3 The Committee of Technical Experts may decide to allow certificates and declarations made according to another specified format than that prescribed in these</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 12px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Uniform Rules, but containing the information required according to Article 11, to be recognised as equivalent substitutes.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 86px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;">Article 13 Registers</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 186px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: left;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 Organisationen ska fast- stlla enhetliga frlagor fr de intyg som r angivna i artikel 11, fr frklaringarna enligt artikel 4  2 och fr bedmningsrapporterna enligt artikel 10  7.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 65px;margin-top: 29px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 14px;">2 Frlagorna ska utarbetas och antas av tekniska expertutskottet.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 60px;margin-top: 24px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">3 Tekniska expertutskottet fr besluta att tillta att intyg och frklaringar, som gjorts i enlighet med en annan frlaga n de som freskrivs i dessa enhetliga regler, men</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 65px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">som innehller den information som krvs enligt artikel 11, erknns som jmfrliga substitut.</P>
<P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p1443">Artikel 13</P>
<P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p24">Register</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_383" style="position:relative; overflow: hidden;margin: 52px 0px 79px 75px;padding: 0px;border: none;width: 549px;">

<TR>
	<TD class="tr3 td93"><P class="p3 ft205">sans</P></TD>
	<TD colspan=2 class="tr3 td226"><P class="p28 ft205">dlai</P></TD>

	<TD colspan=2 class="tr25 td52"><P class="p3 ft205">gnral.</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr25 td17"><P class="p3 ft136">&nbsp;</P></TD>

</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 10px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 535px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 436px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 141px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p24 ft0">1038</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 5px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">5 Pour lapplication du prsent article, la Commis- sion dexperts techniques considrera les registres tablis par les Etats parties et les organisations rgionales de manire  rduire toute charge excessive pour les parties concernes telles que les organisations rgionales, les Etats parties, les autorits comptentes et lindustrie.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 4px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Afin galement de rduire au minimum les cots pour lOrganisation et dobtenir des systmes de registres cohrents, toutes les parties</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">concernes coordonneront avec lOrganisation leurs plans et le dveloppement des registres qui rentrent dans le champ dapplication des prsentes Rgles uniformes.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">6 Les donnes enregistres dans la banque de donnes sont considres comme</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">preuve rfutable de ladmission technique dun vhicule ferroviaire.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 13px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft204"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft203">7 La Commission dexperts techniques peut dcider que</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">5 When applying this Article, the Committee of Technical Experts shall consider registers set up by Contracting States and regional organisations in such a way so as to reduce undue burden on the involved parties such as</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 7px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">regional organisations, Contracting States, com-</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">petent authorities and industry. In order also to minimise the cost for the Organisation and obtain coherent register systems, all parties involved shall coordinate with the Organi- sation their plans and the development of registers which are within the scope of these Uniform Rules.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">6 The data registered in the data bank shall be considered as prima facie evidence of the technical admission of a railway vehicle.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 18px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft204"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft203">7 The Committee of Tech- nical Experts may decide</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 3px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1652"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">5 Nr denna artikel tillmpas ska tekniska expertutskottet beakta de register som uppfrts av</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">deltagande stater och regionala organisationer fr att minska ondiga brdor p de inblandade parterna, ssom regionala organisat- ioner, deltagande stater, behriga myndigheter och industrin. Fr att ocks minmera kostnaderna fr organisationen och uppn ett sammanhngande regist- ersystem ska alla in- blandade parter koordinera sina planer och utveck- lingen av sdana register som omfattas av dessa en- hetliga rttsregler med or- ganisationen.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 59px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">6 Uppgifterna som regi- sterats i databasen ska anses vara prima facie bevisning fr ett tekniskt godknnande av ett jrnvgsfordon.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft204"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 12px;">7 Tekniska expertutskottet fr besluta att kostnaderna</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_385" style="position:relative; overflow: hidden;margin: 52px 0px 79px 75px;padding: 0px;border: none;width: 549px;">


<DIV style="border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 492px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 2px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 122px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">les frais de cration et de fonctionnement de la banque de donnes seront supports en tout ou partie par les utilisateurs; la fourniture et la modification des donnes seront gratuites, leur consul- tation pouvant par contre faire lobjet dune taxation.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 2px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">that the costs of setting up and running the data bank shall be covered, in whole or in part, by the users; supplying and amending data shall be free of charge, whereas consulting data may be subject to a fee.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 223px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p24">fr att uppfra och hlla <SPAN class="ft215">Prop. 2021/22:83 </SPAN>databasen ska tckas av an-</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 103px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">vndarna, helt eller delvis; lmnande av uppgifter och ndring av uppgifter ska vara gratis, medan att f ut uppgifter kan vara avgifts- belagt.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 17px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 344px;overflow: hidden;">
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 style="width: 344px;font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';">
<TR>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 135px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr3"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Article 14</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr3"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Article 14</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 75px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr3"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Artikel 14</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 135px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Inscriptions et signes</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Inscriptions and signs</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 75px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 12px;" class="p3">Texter och tecken</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 11px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 549px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 2px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 135px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">1 Les vhicules ferroviair- es admis  la circulation doivent porter:</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">un signe, qui tablit clairement quils ont t admis  la circulation en</SPAN></P>
<P class="p2022 ft205">trafic international</P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1446">conformment aux</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">prsentes Rgles uniformes, et</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">les autres inscriptions et signes prescrits dans les PTU, y compris un code didentification unique (le numro du</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">vhicule).</P>
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2036">Lautorit comptente octro- yant ladmission  lexploita- tion est tenue de sassurer quun code didentification alphanumrique a t assign</P>
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2094"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 4px;line-height: 13px;">chaque vhicule. Ce code, qui inclut le code du pays du premier Etat ayant admis le vhicule, doit tre marqu sur chaque vhicule et tre entr dans le Registre national des vhicules (NVR) de cet Etat, ainsi que lexige larticle 13.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 2px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 134px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: left;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft204"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft203">1 Railway vehicles admit- ted to operation must bear</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">a sign, which estab- lishes clearly that they have been admitted to operation in interna- tional traffic according to these Uniform Rules, and</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">the other inscriptions and signs prescribed in the UTP, including a unique identification code (the vehicle</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">number).</P>
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2036">The competent authority which grants the admission to operation is responsible for ensuring that the alpha- numeric identification code is assigned to each vehicle. This code, which shall include the country code of the (first) admitting State, must be marked on each vehicle and be entered in the National Vehicle Register (NVR) of that State as required ac- cording to Article 13.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 280px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 160px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 Jrnvgsfordon som har godknts fr drift ska vara frsedda med</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 155px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">ett tecken som tydligt anger att de har god- knts fr nyttjande i internationell trafik i enlighet med dessa enhetliga rttsregler och</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1632 ft205"><SPAN class="ft205">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 14px;">vriga texter och tecken</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 154px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">som freskrivs i UTP:erna, inklusive en unik identifikationskod (fordonsnumret).</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 154px;margin-top: 14px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Den behriga myndigheten som beviljar driftsgodkn- nandet r ansvarig fr att den</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 154px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">alfanumeriska identifikat- ionskoden anbringas p varje fordon. Denna kod, som ska innehlla landskoden fr den (frsta) godknnande staten, mste mrkas p varje fordon och fras in i statens nation- ella fordonsregister (NVR) i enlighet med artikel 13.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 16px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 395px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">2 La Commission dex- perts techniques fixe le signe prvu au  1, lettre a) ainsi que les dlais de transition pendant lesquels les vhicules ferroviaires admis  la circulation en trafic international peuvent porter des inscriptions et signes drogeant  ceux prescrits selon le  1.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 14px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 10px;line-height: 13px;">2 The Committee of Technical Experts shall lay down the sign provided for in  1 a) and the transitional periods during which the railway vehicles admitted to circulation in international traffic may bear inscriptions and signs derogating from those prescribed in  1.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">2 Tekniska expertutskottet ska faststlla det tecken som avses i  1 a) och de ver- gngsperioder under vilka jrnvgsfordon som har god- knts fr nyttjande i inter- nationell trafik fr vara fr- sedda med texter och tecken som avviker frn dem som r freskrivna enligt  1.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 14px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 498px;overflow: hidden;">
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 style="width: 498px;font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';">
<TR>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 135px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Article 15</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Article 15</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 123px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Artikel 15</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr25 td9"><P class="p3 ft136">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 135px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr0"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p3">Maintenance</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr0"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p3">Maintenance</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 123px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr0"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p3">Underhll</P></TD>
	<TD rowspan=2 class="tr23 td9"><P class="p1147 ft0">1039</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 135px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr29"><P class="p3 ft192">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr29"><P class="p3 ft192">&nbsp;</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 123px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr29"><P class="p3 ft192">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>

</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_386" style="position:relative; overflow: hidden;margin: 53px 0px 79px 29px;padding: 0px;border: none;width: 535px;">


<DIV style="border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 515px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 255px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p24 ft0">Prop. 2021/22:83</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 121px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"> 1 Les vhicules ferro- viaires et les autres mat- riels ferroviaires doivent tre en bon tat dentretien de faon  se conformer aux dispositions spcifies dans les PTU et  y satisfaire en permanence, et de faon  ce</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 121px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">que leur tat ne compromette en aucune manire la scurit dex- ploitation et ne nuise pas  linfrastructure,  lenviron- nement et  la sant publiq- ue lors de leur circulation ou de leur utilisation en trafic international. A cet effet, les vhicules ferroviaires et les autres matriels ferroviaires doivent tre disponibles pour lentretien, les inspec- tions et la maintenance et tre soumis  lentretien, aux inspections et  la</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 121px;padding-right: 14px;margin-top: 5px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">maintenance tels que prescrits dans le fichier de</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 121px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">maintenance joint au</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 121px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">certificat dexploitation, dans les PTU, dans les con- ditions particulires dad- mission conformment  larticle 7a et dans les dis- positions contenues dans le RID.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 15px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 Railway vehicles and other railway material must be in a good state of main- tenance in such a way that they comply with the provi- sions specified in the UTP and satisfy them permanent- ly and that their condition would not in any way</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">compromise operational safety and would not harm the infrastructure, environ- ment and public health by their circulation or their use in international traffic. To that end, railway vehicles and other railway material must be made available for and undergo the service, inspections and mainte- nance as prescribed in the Maintenance File attached to the Certificate of Opera- tion, the UTP, the special conditions of an admission pursuant to Article 7a and in the provisions contained in RID.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 15px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">1 Jrnvgsfordon och annan jrnvgsmateriel ska vara vl underhllna s att de fljer bestmmelserna i UTP:n och permanent upp- fyller dem och att deras skick inte p ngot stt ventyrar driftskerheten eller skadar infrastrukturen, miljn och folkhlsan nr de anvnds i internationell trafik. Jrnvgsfordonen ska fr detta ndaml under- kastas den versyn, de</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 17px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">inspektioner och det underhll som freskrivs i i underhllsjournalen som bi- fogats driftsintyget, UTP:n, i de srskilda villkoren fr godknnande enligt artik- el 7a eller i freskrifter som ingr i RID.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 16px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 535px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 275px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 141px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"> 2 Une entit charge de la maintenance (ECM) est assigne  chaque vhicule avant son admission  lex- ploitation ou son utilisation sur le rseau, et enregistre dans la banque de donnes prvue  larticle 13. Une entreprise ferroviaire, un ges- tionnaire dinfrastructure ou un dtenteur peut tre une ECM. LECM garantit, au moyen dun systme de maintenance, que les vhi- cules dont la maintenance lui a t confie sont aptes  circuler en toute scurit. LECM effectue <NOBR>elle-mme</NOBR> la maintenance ou la <NOBR>sous-traite</NOBR>  des ateliers de maintenance.</P>
<P class="p2124 ft0">1040</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 122px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">2 Each railway vehicle, before it is admitted to operation or used on the network, shall have an entity in charge of maintenance (ECM) assigned to it and this entity shall be registered in the data bank referred to in Article 13. A railway under- taking, an infrastructure manager or a keeper may be an ECM. The ECM shall ensure that the vehicles for which it is in charge of maintenance are in a safe state of running by means of a system of maintenance. The ECM shall carry out the maintenance itself or make use of contracted maintenance workshops.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 12px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">2 Innan ett fordon godknns fr drift eller nyttjande i jrnvgsntet, ska det tilldelas en underhllsansvarig enhet (ECM) och denna enhet ska vara registrerad i databasen enligt artikel 13. Ett jrnvgs- fretag, en infrastruktur- frvaltare eller en innehavare kan vara en ECM. ECM ska se till att fordonen, fr vars underhll den ansvarar, r i skert skick genom ett system fr underhll. ECM ska utfra underhllet sjlv eller anlita kontrakterade underhllsverk- stder.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_387" style="position:relative; overflow: hidden;margin: 51px 0px 79px 75px;padding: 0px;border: none;width: 549px;">


<DIV style="border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 549px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 3px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 122px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">LECM pour un wagon de marchandises doit dtenir un certificat valide dlivr par un</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">contrleur<SPAN style="padding-left:49px;">externe accrdit/reconnu dans lun des Etats parties.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">La Commission dexperts techniques adopte des rgles dtailles complmentaires concernant la certification et le contrle des ECM, les contrleurs accrdits/ recon- nus, leur accrditation/recon- naissance ainsi que les con- trles et certificats de con- trle. Lesdites rgles prcisent si elles sont quivalentes aux</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 4px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">critres applicables au systme de certification des ECM adopts au sein de la Communaut europenne ou dans les Etats appliquant la lgislation communautaire par suite daccords interna- tionaux conclus avec la Com- munaut europenne.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">The ECM for a freight wagon must hold a valid certificate issued by an external auditor accred- ited/recognised in one of the Contracting States.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 5px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">The Committee of Technical Experts shall adopt further detailed rules for certification and auditing of ECM, for accredited/recognised audi- tors, their accreditation/ recognition, the audits and audit certificates. The rules shall indicate whether they are equivalent to the criteria related to the ECM certifica- tion system adopted in the European Community or in the States which apply Community legislation as a result of international agree- ments with the European Community.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 280px;overflow: hidden;">
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 style="width: 223px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';">
<TR>
	<TD class="tr17 td103"><P class="p3 ft205">ECM fr en godsvagn mste</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr17 td192"><P class="p3 ft0">Prop. 2021/22:83</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr12 td103"><P class="p3 ft204">vara certifierad av en extern</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr12 td192"><P class="p3 ft136">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 160px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">revisor ackrediterad eller erknd i ngon deltagande stat.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 155px;margin-top: 13px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft204">Tekniska expertutskottet ska anta ytterligare detalj- erade regler avseende certi- fiering och revision av ECM, avseende ackrediter- ade/erknda revisorer, deras ackreditering/erknnande,</P>
<P class="p24 ft218">revisionsrapporterna och</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 155px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft204">revisionsintygen. Dessa regler ska ange huruvida de motsvarar de krav p ECM som antagits i Europeiska gemenskapen eller i stater som tillmpar gemenskaps- rtt som en fljd av ett inter- nationellt avtal med gemen- skapen.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 3px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 549px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">Lesdites rgles, qui englo- bent galement des rgles relatives au retrait et  la suspension des certificats et accrditations, sont dfinies dans une Annexe aux prs- entes Rgles uniformes dont elles forment partie int- grante.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 17px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">3 Un exploitant ferroviaire est responsable de la circulation, en toute scu- rit, de ses trains, et doit veiller  ce que les vhicules</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft204">en circulation soient convenablement entretenus.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">LECM doit par consquent garantir que des informa- tions fiables concernant les donnes et processus de maintenance soient mises  la disposition de lexploitant ferroviaire, et lexploitant ferroviaire doit fournir  lECM, en temps utile, les donnes et informations concernant lexploitation de ses vhicules et des autres matriels ferroviaires dont lECM est charge. Dans les deux cas, les donnes et</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 14px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">These rules, which shall also include rules for the withdrawal and suspension of certificates and accredi- tations, shall be defined in an Annex to these Uniform Rules and shall form an integral part thereof.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 30px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">3 An operating railway undertaking is responsible for the safe operation of its trains and shall ensure that vehicles carried are properly maintained. Therefore, the ECM must ensure that reliable information about maintenance processes and data are available for the operating railway undertak- ing, and the operating rail- way undertaking must in due time provide the ECM with information and data concerning its operation of the vehicles and other rail- way material for which the ECM is in charge. In both cases the information and data in question shall be</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 293px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 13px;padding-right: 155px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">Dessa regler, som ocks ska innehlla regler fr ter- kallelse och upphvande av certifiering och ackredi- tering, ska defineras i en bilaga till dessa enhetliga rttsregler och ska utgra en del av dem.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 13px;padding-right: 155px;margin-top: 43px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">3 Ett jrnvgsfretag r ansvarigt fr den skra drift- en av sina tg och ska se till att de fordon som anvnds r tillrckligt underhllna. ECM mste drfr se till att tillfrlitlig information om</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 13px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">underhllsprocesser och</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 13px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">underhllsdata finns</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 13px;padding-right: 155px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">tillgnglig fr jrn- vgsfretaget och detta jrn- vgsfretag mste i tid frse ECM med information och uppgifter rrande driften av</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 13px;padding-right: 155px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">fordonen och annan jrnvgsmateriel som ECM r ansvarig fr. I bda fallen ska informationen och uppgifterna i frga anges i bilagan enligt  2.</P>
<P class="p2223 ft0">1041</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_388" style="position:relative; overflow: hidden;margin: 53px 0px 79px 29px;padding: 0px;border: none;width: 535px;">


<DIV style="border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 515px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p24 ft0">Prop. 2021/22:83</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 1px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">informations en question sont spcifies dans lAn- nexe mentionne au  2.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 14px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 6px;line-height: 13px;">4 LECM dun vhicule admis tablit et tient  jour un fichier de relev de maintenance relatif au dit vhicule. Le relev est tenu</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"> la disposition de lautorit nationale comptente qui peut le contrler.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 17px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">5 La Commission dexperts techniques peut adopter des directives ou rglementations sur la certification et le contrle des ateliers de maintenance et la reconnais- sance mutuelle des certificats et contrles. Les rglementa- tions prvues au prsent paragraphe sont dfinies dans une Annexe aux prsentes Rgles uniformes dont elles font partie intgrante, et sont publies sur le site Web de lOrganisation.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 1px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 122px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: left;padding-right: 2px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">specified in the Annex in- dicated in  2.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 28px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">4 The ECM of an admitted vehicle shall keep and update a Maintenance Record File for that vehicle. The file shall be available for inspection by the</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-right: 2px;margin-top: 15px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">competent national authority.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 14px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">5 The Committee of Technical Experts may adopt guidelines or regulations on the certification and auditing of maintenance workshops and the mutual recognition of the certificates and audits. Regulations according to this paragraph shall be defined in an Annex to these Uniform Rules and shall form an integral part thereof and be published on the website of the Organisation.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 57px 0px 0px 12px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">4 Ett godknt fordons ECM ska hlla och uppdatera en journal fr underhllshistorik fr det fordonet. Frteck- ningen ska vara tillgnglig fr inspektion av den behriga nationella myndigheten.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 31px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">5 Tekniska expertutskottet fr anta riktlinjer eller bestmmelser om certifier- ingen och revisionen av un- derhllsverkstder och det msesidiga erknnandet av intyg och revisionsrapport- er. Bestmmelser enligt denna paragraf ska defini- eras i en bilaga till dessa en- hetliga rttsregler och ska utgra en del av dem och publiceras p organisa- tionens hemsida.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>

<DIV style="border:none;margin: 15px 0px 0px 141px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 355px;overflow: hidden;">

	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Article 16</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 87px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">Artikel 16</P></TD>

	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr0"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p3">Incidents, accidents et</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr0"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p3">Accidents, incidents and</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 87px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr0"><P style="font: italic 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 12px;" class="p3">Tillbud, olyckor och</P></TD>

	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">avaries graves</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 134px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">severe damage</P></TD>
	<TD style="padding: 0px;margin: 0px;width: 87px;vertical-align: bottom;" class="tr25"><P style="font: italic 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 14px;" class="p3">allvarliga skador</P></TD>

</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 14px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 535px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 322px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 141px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p24 ft0">1042</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 134px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2036"> 1 En cas dincident, daccident ou davarie grave de vhicules ferroviaires, lensemble des parties im- pliques (les gestionnaires de linfrastructure, les dten- teurs, lECM, les entreprises ferroviaires concernes et, le cas chant, dautres acteurs) sont tenus:</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 3px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">de prendre, sans dlai, toutes les mesures n- cessaires pour assurer la scurit du trafic fer- roviaire, le respect de lenvironnement et la sant publique, et</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 13px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 16px;line-height: 13px;">dtablir les causes de lincident, de laccident ou de lavarie grave.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1993 ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN class="ft225">1a Les mesures prvues au</SPAN></P>
<P class="p2036 ft205"><SPAN class="ft205"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 10px;line-height: 14px;">1 doivent tre coor- donnes. Une telle coordi-</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 122px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 In case of accident, in- cident or severe damage to railway vehicles, all parties involved (the infrastructure managers, the keepers, the ECM, the railway undertak- ings concerned and possible others), shall be required</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 29px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">b)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">to take, without delay, all necessary measures to ensure the safety of railway traffic, respect for the environment and public health and</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 1px;margin-top: 15px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">d)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">to establish the causes of the accident, the in- cident or the severe damage.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 15px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1a The measures according to  1 must be coordinated. Such coordination is the</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 12px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">1 Vid tillbud, olycka eller allvarlig skada p jrnvgs- fordon ska alla inblandade parter (infrastrukturfrvalt- arna, innehavarna, ECM,</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 5px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">aktuella jrnvgsfretag och, i frekommande fall, andra aktrer) vara skyldiga att</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 5px;margin-top: 9px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">utan drjsml vidta alla ndvndiga t- grder fr att sker-</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">stlla jrnvgstrafi- kens skerhet, hnsyn</P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-left: 24px;padding-right: 5px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">till miljn och folk- hlsan, och</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-left: 24px;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;text-indent: -24px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204">c)</SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 15px;line-height: 13px;">faststlla orsakerna till tillbudet, olyckan eller den allvarliga skadan.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 28px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">1a tgrderna enligt  1 mste samordnas. Det r in- frastrukturfrvaltarens skyl-</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_389" style="position:relative; overflow: hidden;margin: 51px 0px 79px 75px;padding: 0px;border: none;width: 498px;">


<DIV style="border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 492px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 3px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">nation est du ressort du gestionnaire dinfrastruct- ure, sauf stipulation con- traire des dispositions en vigueur dans lEtat en ques- tion. Outre le devoir den- qute impos aux parties impliques, lEtat partie peut exiger quune enqute indpendante soit mene.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 3px 0px 0px 14px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583">obligation of the infrastruc- ture manager unless otherwise prescribed by provisions in force in the State in question. In addition to the duty of investigation placed upon the</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">parties involved, the Contracting State may require an independent investigation to be carried out.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 223px;overflow: hidden;">

	<TD class="tr31 td103"><P class="p3 ft204">dighet att samordna, om inte</P></TD>

<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 98px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">freskrifter i den aktuella staten. Utver skyldigheten att utreda som parterna har, fr den deltagande staten krva att en oberoende utredning ska ga rum.</P>

<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 3px 0px 0px 15px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">2 A vehicle shall be considered severely dam- aged when it cannot be repaired by a simple operation which would allow it to be joined in a train and to circulate on its own wheels without danger for the operations. If the repair can be carried out in less than 72 hours or the cost is less than 0.18 million SDR in total, the damage shall not be considered as severe.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 3px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 125px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">2 Ett fordon ska anses vara allvarligt skadat nr det inte lngre kan tgrdas genom en mindre reparation som gr att det kan ing i ett tg och rulla p egna hjul utan fara fr driften. Om reparationen kan utfras p mindre n 72 timmar eller om kostnaden r lgre n 0,18 miljoner SDR ska inte skadan anses som allvarlig.</SPAN></P>

<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 2px 0px 0px 14px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 121px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">3 The accidents, incidents and severe damage shall be notified, without delay, to the authority or body which admitted the vehicle to circulation. That authority or body may require the damaged vehicle to be presented, possibly already repaired, for examination of the validity of the admission to operation which has been granted. If appropriate, the procedure concerning the grant of admission to operation must be repeated.</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 19px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 6px;line-height: 13px;">4 The Contracting States shall keep records, publish investigation reports includ- ing their findings and recommendations, inform the approval certificate issuing authority and the Organisa- tion of the causes of accidents, incidents and severe damage in international traffic that occurred on their territory. The Committee of Technical Experts may examine the</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 2px 0px 0px 13px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 229px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 104px;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">3 Tillbud, olyckor och allvarliga skador ska utan drjsml meddelas den myndighet eller organ som har godknt fordonet fr trafik. Denna myndighet eller detta organ kan begra att det skadade fordonet, eventuellt redan reparerat, ska visas upp fr prvning av giltigheten av det beviljade godknnandet fr drift. Vid behov ska fr- farandet fr beviljande av</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: left;padding-right: 109px;margin-top: 17px;margin-bottom: 0px;" class="ft205">godknnande fr drift upprepas.</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;padding-right: 104px;margin-top: 13px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">4 De deltagande staterna ska fra en frteckning, publicera utredningsrappor- ter, inklusive vad de funnit och rekommenderat, infor- mera den utfrdande god- knnandemyndigheten och organisationen om orsaker- na till tillbud, olyckor och allvarlig skada i internation- ell trafik som intrffat p deras territorium. Tekniska</SPAN></P>

	<TD class="tr3 td254"><P class="p3 ft136">&nbsp;</P></TD>
</TR>
<TR>
	<TD class="tr0 td80"><P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p3">ff).</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr0 td121"><P style="font: 1px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p3">&nbsp;</P></TD>

	<TD class="tr0 td225"><P style="font: 1px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p3">&nbsp;</P></TD>

	<TD colspan=3 class="tr17 td109"><P style="font: italic 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 12px;" class="p3">rejection of vehicles</P></TD>

</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV style="border:none;margin: 11px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 535px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 245px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 141px;overflow: hidden;">
<P class="p24 ft0">1044</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 134px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2036"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 Une autorit comptente, une autre entreprise de transport ferroviaire ou un gestionnaire dinfrastructure ne peut pas refuser ou im- mobiliser des vhicules ferro- viaires en vue dempcher leur circulation sur des infra- structures ferroviaires compa- tibles si les prsentes Rgles uniformes, les prescriptions contenues dans les PTU, les</SPAN></P>
<P style="font: 11px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1547">ventuelles conditions</P>
<P class="p1445 ft205">particulires dadmission</P>
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p2036">dfinies par lautorit dadmission ainsi que les prescriptions de construction et dexploitation contenues dans le RID, sont respectes.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 122px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 3px;line-height: 13px;">1 A competent authority, another rail transport under- taking or an infrastructure manager may not reject or immobilise railway vehicles to prevent them from running on compatible railway infra- structures if these Uniform Rules, the prescriptions con- tained in the UTP, the special conditions, if any, for the admission set out by the admitting authority as well as the construction and operation prescriptions contained in RID, are complied with.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 12px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 126px;overflow: hidden;">
<P style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;" class="p1583"><SPAN class="ft204"></SPAN><SPAN style="font: 10px 'Times New Roman';margin-left: 2px;line-height: 13px;">1 En behrig myndighet, ett annat jrnvgsfretag eller en infrastrukurfrvaltare fr inte</SPAN></P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 1px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">avvisa eller stoppa jrnvgsfordon fr att hindra deras drift p kompatibel</P>
<P style="text-align: justify;margin-top: 2px;margin-bottom: 0px;font: 10px 'Times New Roman';line-height: 13px;">jrnvgsinfrastruktur nr dessa enhetliga rttsregler, freskrifterna i UTP:erna, de eventuella srskilda villkoren fr godknnande som satts upp av den godknnande myndigheten och konstrukt- ions- och driftsfreskrifterna i RID har iakttagits.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_391" style="position:relative; overflow: hidden;margin: 54px 0px 81px 75px;padding: 0px;border: none;width: 549px;">


<DIV style="border:none;margin: 0px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 492px;overflow: hidden;">
<DIV style="float:left;border:none;margin: 16px 0px 0px 0px;padding: 0px;border:none;width: 122px;overflow: hidden;">
